SEARCH
Package org.biojava.nbio.core.alignment.matrices

Class SubstitutionMatrixHelper

java.lang.Object
org.biojava.nbio.core.alignment.matrices.SubstitutionMatrixHelper
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class SubstitutionMatrixHelper extends Object implements Serializable
Static utility to access substitution matrices that come bundled with BioJava. All matrices were downloaded from ftp://ftp.ncbi.nih.gov/blast/matrices/
Author:
Mark Chapman, Paolo Pavan
See Also:

    • getAminoAcidSubstitutionMatrix

      public static SubstitutionMatrix<AminoAcidCompound> getAminoAcidSubstitutionMatrix(String name)
      Returns a substitution matrix for amino acids given by the name name. Searches first in the default AAINDEX file (see @link getMatrixFromAAINDEX(String)), then in the classpath in src/main/resources/matrices. Example names:
      • blosum62
      • JOND920103
      • pam250
      • gonnet250
      Parameters:
      name - Either a common name or an AAINDEX name
      Returns:
      a SubstitutionMatrix or null if no matrix is found
